messages:
Name: Christian Noboa
Nationality: Ecuador
Date of Birth: April 9, 1985
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Sochi
Premier League clubs played for: Rubin Kazan, Dinamo Moskva, Rostov, Zenit, Sochi

Christian Noboa is a Sochi midfielder who has played in the vast majority of their Premier League games in 2020/2021, making 25 appearances overall and accumulating 2,175 minutes of playing time. He has started in all 25 of these appearances across their 30 fixtures.

Noboa last appeared in a league game on May 16, playing 90 minutes for Sochi versus Khimki in a 0-0 stalemate. The midfielder has scored 12 Premier League goals this season, which is the sixth highest tally in the competition in 2020/2021, whilst he also ranks joint first for Premier League assists this season having set up seven goals for his team-mates. He has amassed six yellow cards.

Noboa last scored in the league with a brace in the 3-1 win against Krasnodar on May 1, netting in the sixth and 94th minute. He opened his account for the campaign against Spartak Moskva on August 9, scoring during a 2-2 draw.
Last season for Sochi, Noboa made 19 Premier League appearances, scored four goals and provided three assists.
Noboa moved to Sochi in August 2019 from Zenit, for whom he made 13 league appearances in total, providing two assists.
